scripts.build:testing: npm run clean:testing && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing babel ./src --out-dir testing --copy-files && mv ./testing/app.js ./testing/index.js && cp package.json ./testing/package.json && cp .env.testing ./testing/.env
scripts.build:staging: npm run clean:staging && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging babel ./src --out-dir staging --copy-files && mv ./staging/app.js ./staging/index.js && cp package.json ./staging/package.json && cp .env.staging ./staging/.env
scripts.deploy:testing: npm run build:testing && deta deploy ./testing && (cd ./testing && deta update -e .env)
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && deta deploy ./staging && (cd ./staging && deta update -e .env)
scripts.seed:dev: node-pg-migrate --envPath .env.development down 0 && node-pg-migrate --envPath .env.development up && cross-env NODE_ENV=development babel-node ./src/db/postgres/seeder.js
